pageProduct.name: Sambucol Adult Cough Liquid 250ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Sambucol Black Elderberry Cough Liquid combines Ivy Leaf and Sambucol's unique Black Elderberry formula for effective cough relief. A great tasting easy to take formula.

Black Elderberry is traditionally used in Western Herbal Medicine to help reduce the symptoms of common Cold & Flu.

Why Ivy Leaf?
Ivy Leaf is a trusted ingredient that works as an expectorant to:
- Relieve Chesty Coughs
- Clear respiratory tract mucous
- Reduce bronchial mucous congestion
- Reduce excess chest phlegm

Size: 250mL

Warnings

If symptoms persist, talk to your health professional.

Not to be used in children under 2 years of age without medical advice.

Contains sorbates, glucose & sulfites.

Keep out of reach of children. Do not use if tamper evident seal is broken or missing.

Ingredients

Active ingredients per 15 mL oral liquid:
Sambucus nigra (Black Elderberry)
fruit juice dry 140mg
equiv. to fruit juice fresh 4.9g
Hedra helix leaf (Ivy Leaf)
leaf ext. dry conc. 25mg
equiv. to leaf dry 200mg

Directions

Adults: 15 ml (1 Tablespoon) 3 times daily.

Best taken at first sign of cough - within 48 hours of onset of symptoms or as recommended by your healthcare practitioner.

Shake well before use.
